data.name: Formula 2D - Steer to persevere
data.detailed_description:
Formula 2D - Steer To Perseveer is a top of the line Formula Racing game where mild similiraties to F1 are entirely coincidental

- Create and customize your team
- Upgrade your facilities to upgrade the car üèóÔ∏è
- Become the world champion and climb the rankings

data.short_description: Formula 2D - Steer To Perseveer is a top of the line Formula Racing game where mild similiraties to F1 are entirely coincidental - Create and customize your team - Upgrade your facilities to upgrade the car üèóÔ∏è - Become the world champion and climb the rankings
data.reviews:
‚ÄúHigh-resolution textures, brilliant lighting effects and a realistic damage model. These are all features that Formula 2D: Steer to Persevere can't boast of. But it proves that these are not necessary at all to present a solid game. And unlike the shooting star from Codemasters and Electronic Arts, the top-down racing game is a one-person project by zyg101, where the small details make all the difference.‚Äù
Quick-Save

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 and above
  • Processor: 1.2 ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 mb video memory
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.11+
  • Processor: 1.2 ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 mb video memory
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
